title: Middle School Mathematics Blended Learning Intensive Course for the Workplace

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic math concepts at a 5th-6th grade elementary level
context.additional_context: Designed for working professionals, operating during evening hours outside of work. Requires flexible instructional design to accommodate individual learning progress differences.

learning_goals: Learners can explain core middle school (grades 1-3) mathematics concepts (equations, functions, geometry) with over 80% accuracy using a blended learning platform
Learners engage in at least three mathematical communication activities during collaborative problem-solving tasks with peers using real-time collaboration tools
Learners reduce individual learning gaps by over 50% within one week through formative assessments (quizzes, assignments)

resources: LMS with Built-In Adaptive Learning Algorithm

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
